Mission Driven.
Returns Oriented.

Ten X Labs is an Angel and pre-Seed fund that differentiates itself by creating deep, trusting bonds with first-time Founders before they're even ready for investment. We combine this trust with expertise and capital to help speed up business maturity, building minority-led, Seed-ready companies for a fraction of the cost.

THE TEN X LABS PLAYBOOK

Discovering Founders who have something to prove

Ten X Labs is discovering great first time founders who aren’t being served today, at scale. This means that your investment is priced at very early stage valuations, while at the same time, we de-risk those investments through the unique pre-investment due diligence we perform and the post-investment operating model we provide. Plus, you’ll also be a part of changing the financial and business landscape surrounding these new Founders.

More about the Ten X Labs Playbook

THE BIG PICTURE

Closing the equity gap

Ten X labs represents an opportunity to invest in market-shifting businesses and to shift the landscape of the founders behind them.

We’re Creating

50
million dollar investment fund

We’re Investing

30
first-time founders of color

We’re Growing

10
seed stage companies

There is a 10x disparity between people of color in the U.S. vs. the number of those Founders backed by VC’s. We aim to help close that gap.
